meanings.sent1: The elephant made the boomiest noise in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks were the boomiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The boomiest drum in the band kept everyone dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the boomiest, echoing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The boomiest thunder shook the entire house.

meanings.sent1: The music played boomiest during the concert.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks exploded boomiest in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The speaker's voice echoed boomiest in the empty hall.
meanings.sent4: The applause rang boomiest after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The thunder rumbled boomiest during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The boomiest came from the fireworks display.
meanings.sent2: The boomiest was heard during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent3: The boomiest at the concert made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The boomiest of all was the lion's roar.
meanings.sent5: The boomiest echoed through the canyon.
